settings.webhook_url_help: The URL to send notification webhooks to. Leave empty to disable.
settings.webhook_token_help: Optional Bearer token for Authorization header.
settings.timeout_help: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 30.
settings.retry_count_help: Number of retry attempts on failure. Default is 3.
settings.channel_label_help: Display name for the notification channel shown in user settings.

validation.timeout_invalid: Timeout must be between 1 and 300 seconds.
validation.retry_count_invalid: Retry count must be between 0 and 10.
validation.channel_icon_invalid: Invalid icon format. Use Font Awesome format (e.g., fas fa-globe).
validation.channel_label_required: Channel label is required when icon is set.
